data.md:MetaData: Pollen profile MUTORO1, Mutorog Peat Bog, Bulgaria
central part. Core diameter: 2 cm. Area: 0.4 ha. Peat bog. Physiography: depression. Surrounding vegetation: coniferous forest, Picea, Abies, Pinus sylvestris.
A palaeoecological investigation on the vegetaion history in the Southern Pirin Mountains (southwestern Bulgaria)
